text.jpText: 果てしなく続くような 高い壁を前にして
text.enText:
Here I stand before this lofty wall 
Looming above, seeming to go on forever

text.jpText: この震えは 覚悟 証でしょう
text.enText:
This trembling I feel within, 
Is it proof of my resolve?

text.jpText: 誇り高く狭き門を目指し 数多の夢が
text.enText:
Aiming for that illustrious yet narrow gate, 
Where countless other dreams converge

text.jpText: 敗れて散って また目指して 無謀だとしても構わない
text.enText:
Even if I were to lose, I'll still try again 
Even if it's foolhardy, it doesn't matter

text.jpText: 未踏の頂へ 挑めL'Arc de gloire
text.enText: I'll still challenge that uncharted summit, L'Arc de Gloire

text.jpText: 「信念」と「執念」の果てに 辿り着く

text.enText: Traversing this vast ocean before me

text.jpText: 遥か彼方 願いの先信じた
text.enText: By putting my faith in this far flung, Distant longing of mine

text.jpText: 挫けそうな 諦めそうな 脚走らせ
text.enText:
Even when I might break, 
On the verge of surrender, 
My feet still carry on

text.jpText: 轟いた歓声を 置き去りにしていった
text.enText:
Dashing past every one of those heartfelt cheers, 
I'll keep pressing forward

text.jpText: 目の前に誰もいないゴールは 雄大なユートピア
text.enText: Seeing that goal, With nobody in front of me, Is a magnificent utopia

text.jpText: 栄光と勝利の輝き 嗚呼 手にしたんだ
text.enText:
That shine of glory and victory 
Ah, is now within my grasp

text.jpText: この奇跡と呼ばれる必然は
text.enText: Assuredly this could be expressed as a miracle

text.jpText: 長く険しい旅路の先 届いた
text.enText: After a long and arduous journey, We're finally arriving
Now, at the gates of glory
